spiritsExplanation:
The workout spirit "Structured & Disciplined" is highly suitable for this video as it is specifically designed for beginners, focusing on six-pack abs through a 'beginner ab workout' routine. The title and description emphasize it being a 'total beginner' workout, suggesting a structured plan tailored for entry-level participants. The instruction to "keep your body straight" from one of the comments also indicates precise technical guidance. The score of 0.7 reflects the systematic approach aimed at beginners and the methodical delivery, common in this spirit.

"Flow & Rhythm" is an apt secondary spirit since the workout is a 10-minute, equipment-free routine that can be performed anywhere, suggesting a potential for continuous movement and a mind-body connection, although not explicitly music-driven. The video is described as enjoyable and encouraging, further indicating elements of rhythm. The score of 0.5 indicates a moderate match, as the focus seems more structured than flow-oriented.

Other spirits like "High-Energy & Intense" or "Soothing & Restorative" are excluded due to the workout's beginner-friendly, non-intense nature, as indicated by user feedback emphasizing accessibility.
